authors.author: Gloria in excelsis Deo in English Christmas

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Angels we have heard on high
singing sweetly through the night
And the mountains in reply
echoing their brave delight.
Glo-oooooooooo ria in excelsis Deo x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shephards why this jubilee
why this song of happy cheers
what great brightness id you see
what glad tidings did you hear
Glo-oooooooooo ria in excelsis Deo x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
come to Bethlehem and see Him
whose birth the angels sing
come adore on bended knees
Christ the Lord the new born king
Glo-oooooooooo ria in excelsis Deo x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
see Him in a manger laid
whom the Angels praise above
Mary,Joseph lend your aid
while w raise our hearts in love
Glo-oooooooooo ria in excelsis Deo x2
